Statement.Title: GetRoleInfoById
Statement.Comment: 根據ID獲取角色相關的信息
Statement.Sql: select * from Sys_Roles where RoleCode=@RoleCode select * from Sys_Privilege where PrivilegeCode in (select PrivilegeCode from Sys_Role_Privilege where RoleCode=@RoleCode) select * from Sys_Privilege where PrivilegeCode not in (select PrivilegeCode from Sys_Role_Privilege where RoleCode=@RoleCode)

Statement.Title: UpdatePwd
Statement.Sql: update Sys_Users set Password=@Password where UserID=@UserID

Statement.Title: GetUserTypeGradeEmp
Statement.Comment: 獲取用戶類型，用戶級別，用戶所屬部門或廠商
Statement.Sql: select * from Sys_User_Type select * from Sys_User_Grade select * from Sys_Department

Statement.Title: GetAllDepts
Statement.Comment: 獲取所有的用戶部門信息

Statement.Title: GetUserInfoByUserId
Statement.Comment: 根據用戶id獲取對應的用戶信息
Statement.Sql: select a.*, ISNULL(b.DepartmentCode,'') as DepartmentCode, isnull(c.EmpNO,'') as EmpNo, ISNULL(d.VendorCode,'') as VendorCode from Sys_Users as a left join Sys_User_Dep as b on a.UserAccount=b.UserAccount left join Sys_User_Emp as c on a.UserAccount=c.UserAccount left join Sys_User_Vendor as d on a.UserAccount=d.UserAccount where UserID=@UserID

Statement.Title: GetRoleInfoByUserId
Statement.Comment: 獲取用戶對應的角色或權限
Statement.Sql: select * from Sys_Users where UserID=@UserID select * from Sys_Roles where RoleCode not in (select RolePrivilegeCode from Sys_User_Role_Privilege where UserID=@UserID and Flag='1') select * from Sys_Roles where RoleCode in (select RolePrivilegeCode from Sys_User_Role_Privilege where UserID=@UserID and Flag='1') select * from Sys_Privilege where PrivilegeCode not in (select RolePrivilegeCode from Sys_User_Role_Privilege where UserID=@UserID and Flag='2') select * from Sys_Privilege where PrivilegeCode in (select RolePrivilegeCode from Sys_User_Role_Privilege where UserID=@UserID and Flag='2')

Statement.Title: GetRolesByUserId
Statement.Comment: 獲取用戶對應的角色或權限
Statement.Sql: select RolePrivilegeCode from Sys_User_Role_Privilege where UserID=@UserID and Flag='1'

Statement.Title: DeleteRole
Statement.Sql: delete from Sys_Roles where RoleCode=@RoleCode delete from Sys_Role_Privilege where RoleCode=@RoleCode

Statement.Title: DeleteUser
Statement.Sql: update Sys_Users set IsEnabled='0',UpdateTime=getdate() where UserID=@UserID
